expressions.description: Adds the Coded Values assigned to the Types. Works for the Points, Lines, and Polygons layers.
expressions.expression:
CASE
	WHEN "Type" = 'Floor Change' THEN 1
	WHEN "Type" = 'Ceiling Change' THEN 2
	WHEN "Type" = 'Ceiling Channel' THEN 3
	WHEN "Type" = 'Cross Section Location' THEN 4
	WHEN "Type" = 'Floor Channel' THEN 5
	WHEN "Type" = 'Lower Level' THEN 6
	WHEN "Type" = 'Stream Flow' THEN 7
	WHEN "Type" = 'Approximate Passage' THEN 8
	WHEN "Type" = 'Upper Level' THEN 9
	WHEN "Type" = 'Wall' THEN 10	
	WHEN "Type" = 'Ceiling Height' THEN 101
	WHEN "Type" = 'Column' THEN 102
	WHEN "Type" = 'Datum' THEN 103
	WHEN "Type" = 'Elevation above Datum' THEN 104
	WHEN "Type" = 'Elevation below Datum' THEN 105
	WHEN "Type" = 'Flowstone' THEN 106
	WHEN "Type" = 'Large Breakdown' THEN 107
	WHEN "Type" = 'Pit Depth' THEN 108
	WHEN "Type" = 'Slope' THEN 109
	WHEN "Type" = 'Small Breakdown' THEN 110
	WHEN "Type" = 'Soda Straws' THEN 111
	WHEN "Type" = 'Stalactite' THEN 112
	WHEN "Type" = 'Stalagmite' THEN 113
	WHEN "Type" = 'Organic Debris' THEN 114
	WHEN "Type" = 'Cross Section Location' THEN 115
	WHEN "Type" = 'Bedrock Pillar' THEN 200
	WHEN "Type" = 'Clay/Silt' THEN 201
	WHEN "Type" = 'Cobbles' THEN 202
	WHEN "Type" = 'Rock' THEN 203
	WHEN "Type" = 'Sand' THEN 204
	WHEN "Type" = 'Water' THEN 205
	ELSE 999
END
expressions.name: Type To Value

expressions.description: Adds the Types assigned to the Coded Values. Works for the Points, Lines, and Polygons layers.
expressions.expression:
CASE
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 1 THEN 'Floor Change'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 2 THEN 'Ceiling Change'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 3 THEN 'Ceiling Channel'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 4 THEN 'Cross Section Location'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 5 THEN 'Floor Channel'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 6 THEN 'Lower Level'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 7 THEN 'Stream Flow'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 8 THEN 'Approximate Passage'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 9 THEN 'Upper Level'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 10 THEN 'Wall'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 101 THEN 'Ceiling Height'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 102 THEN 'Column'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 103 THEN 'Datum'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 104 THEN 'Elevation above Datum'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 105 THEN 'Elevation below Datum'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 106 THEN 'Flowstone'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 107 THEN 'Large Breakdown'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 108 THEN 'Pit Depth'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 109 THEN 'Slope'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 110 THEN 'Small Breakdown'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 111 THEN 'Soda Straws'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 112 THEN 'Stalactite'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 113 THEN 'Stalagmite'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 114 THEN 'Organic Debris'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 115 THEN 'Cross Section Label'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 200 THEN 'Bedrock Pillar'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 201 THEN 'Clay/Silt'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 202 THEN 'Cobbles'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 203 THEN 'Rock'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 204 THEN 'Sand'
	WHEN "Coded Value" = 205 THEN 'Water'
	ELSE 'Bad Value'
END
expressions.name: Value To Type
